alert.note: Alert for Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 13 at 3:29PM EDT until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southern New Hampshire, including the following areas, in New Hampshire, Western And Central Hillsborough. In southern New Hampshire, Cheshire, Eastern Hillsborough and Interior Rockingham. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas.
info.instruction: You should monitor the latest forecast and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
